participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and playful, loves to have fun and enjoy life. Sometimes tends to be a bit self-centered.
participant_1.background: I diet a lot. I'm high maintenance. I love listening to Britney Spears. I like to tan in tanning beds. I love spending money.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Quiet and reflective, enjoys deep conversations but can be easily anxious in social situations.
participant_2.background: I'm employed by the US Postal Service. I've a German Shepherd named Barnaby. My favorite color is grey. I'm terrified of scorpions. My father drove a car for NASCAR.
